short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open random links from a web page on new tabs. Songs from albums, videos from playlists, shows from streaming platforms and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you have a playlist of Youtube, and you can not decide which one to watch?
This extension is for you.

Do you have a group of articles, and you can not decide which one to read?
This extension is for you
